original_text: But another person is sad all his life, until he dies. No good things ever happen to him. But another person is sad all his life, until he dies. No good things ever happen to him. But another person is sad all his life, until he dies. No good things ever happen to him. But another person is sad all his life, until he dies.
korean_text: 어떤 사람은 마음에 고통을 품고 죽으므로 행복을 맛보지 못하는도다

sentences.original_text: But another person is sad all his life,
No good things ever happen to him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게는 좋은 일이 전혀 일어나지 않습니다.
